text: @realDonaldTrump Rasmussen poll obviously not correct. Coronavirus real issue. You are talking about yourself. This is pathetic. You do realize that people need to know that government knows what they are doing. You obviously don’t have clue, because you are so focused on yourself.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
